name: The Region
description: The region is affected by an unknown virus that has destroyed almost all living things.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 470 / Radeon HD 5850 or Better Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3 or Better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7770 or Better Storage: 5 GB available space
